definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.chinese: 全是胡說八道，我寫的東西。

sentences.english: Don't run your mind games on me, that's my number! What's this bozo 's name?
sentences.chinese: 別對我胡說八道，這是我的號碼，那傢伙叫什麼名字？

sentences.english: Her silly talk verged on nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 她的蠢話近乎胡說八道。

sentences.english: Or as my younger son would say, fudge knuckle.
sentences.chinese: 或者像我的小兒子會說的一樣，胡說八道。

sentences.english: I don't know what b. s. you guys are saying lol.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你們在胡說八道什麼。

sentences.english: The idea that some cigarettes are healthier than others is a whole lot of malarkey .
sentences.chinese: 有些香菸比其它香菸更健康的這種想法全是胡說八道。

sentences.english: I pray you, sir, what saucy merchant was this, that was so full of his ropery?
sentences.chinese: 先生，這個滿嘴胡說八道的放肆傢伙是誰？

sentences.english: This is what its members claim. It's nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 這是其成員的話，簡直是胡說八道。

sentences.english: It's fun to hear her gabble .
sentences.chinese: 聽聽她那一套胡說八道也是好玩的。

sentences.english: Don't Listen to their nonsense, here is no thing love which.
sentences.chinese: 別聽她們胡說八道，根本就沒那回事。

sentences.english: Oh, I never heard of such nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我從沒聽說過這種胡說八道。

sentences.english: We suspect that there will be all sorts of self-justifying guff from them.
sentences.chinese: 我懷疑這裏會充滿各式各樣胡說八道的自我辯白。

sentences.english: Codswallop, in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there still too tirend to carry on.
sentences.chinese: 但依我看是胡說八道，不，我想他還躲在某個地方。

sentences.english: Well, nothing like that has happened—it's complete nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 呃，那樣的事情從未發生過，完全是胡說八道。

definition: to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
to take one's seat according to the ticket number/(fig.) to put (things or people) in their right place/to take a general comment as a personal attack
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
frigid irony and scorching satire (idiom); to mock and ridicule
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
to show respect from a distance (idiom)/to remain at a respectful distance
to interrupt/to break off/to break (a bone)
